data.eml:eml: Four new species of Polycirrus Grube, 1850 (Polychaeta: Terebellidae) from Campos Basin, southeastern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Carrerette, Orlemir, Nogueira, João Miguel De Matos (2013): Four new species of Polycirrus Grube, 1850 (Polychaeta: Terebellidae) from Campos Basin, southeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 3626 (1): 146-172, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3626.1.6
